channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pageant Queen Dies at 28 After Sharing Her Year-Long Cervical Cancer Journey
item.description: Raquel Escalante, a Guatemalan pageant queen and TV host, maintained a combined following of over 400,000 on social media

item.title: Kim Kardashian Reveals Her 'Insane' Christmas Decorations as She Decks Her Home with Dozens of Trees
item.description: The SKIMS founder revealed her holiday decor on Instagram on Tuesday, Dec. 2

item.title: Why Isn’t “Late Night with Seth Meyers” on This Week? Here’s When It Will Return
item.description: Meyers announced his show's post-Thanksgiving break on Friday, Nov. 28

item.title: Gavin Newsom Mocks Trump's Glowing MRI Results by Sharing His Own Doctor's Note That Declares Him the 'Healthiest Human Alive'
item.description: Newsom shared a fake memo from "Dr. Dolittle" after the White House released the results from Trump's MRI scans on Monday, Dec. 1

item.title: Sarah Ferguson Is House-Hunting in Windsor as Move-Out Date for Her and Andrew Is Revealed amid Title Scandal (Exclusive Source)
item.description: The former Duchess of York is preparing to leave Royal Lodge — and a source tells PEOPLE she’s now searching in Windsor as a firm move-out date looms
